statements: SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_description, incident_date, resolution_description, resolution_date FROM supply_chain_incidents;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Security Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, resolution_description FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Security Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Leak' AND resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_type FROM supply_chain_incidents ORDER BY incident_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date FROM SupplyChainIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT description FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, resolution FROM SupplyChainIncidents INNER JOIN IncidentCategories ON SupplyChainIncidents.incident_id = IncidentCategories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC, incident_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT incident_id, description FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT description, resolution FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE incident_id = 3
SELECT * FROM IncidentCategories WHERE category_id = 1
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE description LIKE '%security%'
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description, resolution FROM SupplyChainIncidents;
SELECT description, incident_date, incident_id, resolution FROM SupplyChainIncidents;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT resolution, description, incident_id, incident_date FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE incident_id >= 5;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIncidents;
SELECT * FROM IncidentCauses ORDER BY cause_id DESC;
SELECT description, resolution FROM SupplyChainIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT SupplyChainIncidents.description, IncidentCauses.cause_description FROM SupplyChainIncidents JOIN IncidentCauses ON SupplyChainIncidents.incident_id = IncidentCauses.incident_id;
SELECT location_id, location_description FROM IncidentLocations WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, resolution_status FROM supply_chain_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_category, product_name;
SELECT resolution_description, resolution_owner FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, resolution_status FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'USA' AND contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_description FROM products ORDER BY product_category, product_name;
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT incident_description FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM incident_comments ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT assignee_name, incident_description FROM incident_assignees JOIN incidents ON incident_assignees.assignee_id = incidents.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT ic.incident_id, ic.incident_description, ra.resolution_description FROM incidents ic INNER JOIN resolution_actions ra ON ic.incident_id = ra.incident_id;
SELECT ic.incident_id, ic.incident_date, ic.incident_description, ic.resolved, icc.category_name FROM incidents ic LEFT JOIN incident_categories icc ON ic.incident_id = icc.category_id;
SELECT ia.assignee_name, ic.comment_text FROM incident_assignees ia INNER JOIN incident_comments ic ON ia.assignee_id = ic.assignee_id;
